name: SHARK
description: In the game SHARK you control the shark, which should eat orange plankton to evolve. Do not fall into the fishing nets and dodge the flying harpoons in you! And do not try to swallow an underwater mine, it will also kill you!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higer Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz or higer Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB video card memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 135 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7-8 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.6Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB video card memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 135 MB available space
